page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: {Clarborough}is the most densely populated part of the survey area.The village is divided by the busy A 620 road into two fairly distinct parts.The eastern side of the A 620 is the oldest part of the village with St.John the Baptist's Church,the Old Vicarage,the Junior School and many properties dating back over the centuries. The western part of the village is comparatively new,with the main housing development being only about fifteen to twenty years old. { {Little Gringley}is still little more than a hamlet.Farmhouses and a few more modern bungalows and houses make up this tiny village, which is reached by a quiet country road.
